properties.areaDesc: Western Mackinac; Eastern Mackinac; Beaver Island and surrounding islands
properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 21 at 10:43AM EST until January 22 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Western Mackinac, Eastern Mackinac and Beaver Island
and surrounding islands Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the
lakeshore. Ice shoves onto coastal areas...including portions
near US-2...are also possible with strong southwest winds
expected.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY
